definition: to melt (metal)/to cancel or annul/to sell/to spend/to fasten with a bolt/bolt or pin

sentences.english: The second quarter, the continuous high card.
sentences.chinese: 二季度，重卡產銷量持續處於高位。

sentences.english: All sorts of seamless steel tube production and the highest are over.
sentences.chinese: 各種無縫鋼管產銷量均創歷年來的同期最高。

sentences.english: Only correct market research enables both production and marketing to thrive.
sentences.chinese: 市場調查準確，才能使產品產銷兩旺。

sentences.english: Our factory practises direct linking of production and sales, thus ensuring supply of goods.
sentences.chinese: 本廠實行產銷直接掛鉤，保證供應。

sentences.english: The rate of industrial production and marketing had some growth, whereas exports grew considerably.
sentences.chinese: 工業產銷率有所提高，出口增長較快。

sentences.english: Creation of enterprises , has accumulated a wealth of marketing experience.
sentences.chinese: 企業創立至今，積累了豐富的產銷經驗。

sentences.english: Production and marketing, and favorable to improve marketing efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 產銷合一，有利提高營銷效率。

sentences.english: In 2003 Wu Han iron & steel company constructs the Entity Producing & Selling Information System.
sentences.chinese: 2003年武鋼上馬了整體產銷資訊系統。

sentences.english: A profit center may determine which of products and how many products should be produced and sold.
sentences.chinese: 利潤中心可以決定產銷哪些產品和多少產品。

sentences.english: Global brace 50% of sales from the Czech Republic.
sentences.chinese: 全球搖鑽產銷量的50%來自中捷。

sentences.english: Among them heavy industry and level of rate of produce and sale of state owned industry are higher.
sentences.chinese: 其中重工業和國有工業產銷率水平較高。

sentences.english: With the production and operation of integrated production and marketing capacity.
sentences.chinese: 具備產銷一體的生產經營能力。

sentences.english: Realized make up deficits and increase surpluses, promoted target of profit of produce and sale relatively grow substantially.
sentences.chinese: 實現了扭虧增盈，促進了產銷利指標的較大幅度增長。

sentences.english: In domestic market, the production & sales increase fast, especailly for the car market.
sentences.chinese: 國內汽車產銷量快速增長，其中以轎車市場最爲突出。

sentences.english: Biggest roasted coffee company in Mainland China.
sentences.chinese: 中國大陸烘焙咖啡產銷量最大的公司。

definition: to sell in the domestic market/domestic market
